channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: ‘Everything bubble’ bursts: Worst year for US stocks and bonds since 1932
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: While the crypto markets have taken a bashing in 2022, it hasn’t exactly been rosy for US stocks, bonds and real estate either.

item.title: Mike Novogratz calls Helios a ‘transformative acquisition’ for Galaxy
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The Galaxy CEO seems unfazed by the carnage in the BTC mining sector this year, and outlined that the firm is looking to significantly ramp up its mining initiatives.

item.title: Crypto’s recovery requires more aggressive solutions to fraud
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Riccardo Pellegrini
item.description: After 2022, we need to do more to assure skeptical users that they can invest in cryptocurrency without fearing that their funds will be lost.

item.title: The 10 largest crypto hacks and exploits in 2022 saw $2.1B stolen
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: Just the top 10 major cryptocurrency exploits garnered over $2 billion for malicious actors in a year that was marred with bankruptcies and collapses.

item.title: Vader will shut down stablecoin USDV, cannot find a ‘breakthrough’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The remaining treasury will be distributed to users through a redemption app until June, according to the protocol.

item.title: False alarm: DOJ did not classify MNGO as a commodity
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Avi Eisenberg’s arrest on commodities fraud charges for the Mango Markets exploit raised eyebrows on crypto Twitter and required some processing to work through its intricacies.

item.title: Dogecoin devs deny rumor of immediate PoS switch following community concern
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The denial was made after critics said the team was going to “kill scrypt miners.”

item.title: Prosecutors unlikely to offer Sam Bankman-Fried a favorable plea deal, says lawyer
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: Former FTX CEO may not be able to offset the two counts of wire fraud and six counts of conspiracy he faces with the credits by entering a guilty plea.

item.title: Bank of India report calls for regulatory coordination on crypto market challenges
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The RBI’s latest financial stability report accentuated the negative about cryptocurrency and reminds the world that India is looking for global action on crypto regulation.

item.title: FTX’s Liquid exchange hopes to return customer assets next year
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Judith BannermanQuist
item.description: The exchange said it intends to outline further details in a report next month.

item.title: Over 1,400 Chinese firms operating in blockchain industry, national whitepaper shows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Despite partial crypto bans, the Chinese government has included blockchain technology in official state development policy.

item.title: An overview of the metaverse in 2022
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Emilia La Capra
item.description: Metaverse adoption has slowed down in 2022, but investors’ and developers’ enthusiasm remains. Here’s an overview of the tech’s last 12 months.

item.title: Chinese Communist Party official pleads guilty to helping Bitcoin miners
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: Xiao Yi, Communist Party secretary of the City of Fuzhou, financially aided Bitcoin miners between 2017 and 2021.

item.title: BTC price preserves $16.5K, but funding rates raise risk of new Bitcoin lows
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is fooling no one with its current behavior, with bearish takes everywhere and the yearly close just two days away.

item.title: What is Swan Bitcoin and how does it work?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Dilip Kumar Patairya
item.description: Swan Bitcoin has simplified Bitcoin saving with automatic recurring buys and one-time buys. Find how Swan Bitcoin works.

item.title: Robinhood shares claimed by BlockFi and FTX may move to a neutral broker
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Bankruptcy judge Michael Kaplan said that on Jan. 9, he will review if the shares should be transferred to a neutral broker.

item.title: Blockchain analytics unable to prevent FTX-level illicit schemes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Blockchain tracker Whale Alert attempted to scan FTX’s historical balance checks to find out whether it was possible to spot the collapse sooner.

item.title: BMW taps Coinweb and BNB chain for blockchain loyalty program
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: BMW will integrate decentralized tech in two phases- first in its daily operations to eliminate complex paperwork, and the second phase would see the development of a customer loyalty program.

item.title: 70% of unregulated exchange transactions are wash trading: NBER study
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: The researchers found that in some exchanges, the wash trading volume can go as high as 80%.

item.title: Fiji elects pro-Bitcoin prime minister Sitiveni Rabuka
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Joseph Hall
item.description: Fiji elects a pro-Bitcoin prime minister, signaling a positive future for Bitcoin adoption in the pacific island nation.

item.title: Alameda wallets funnel over $1.7M via crypto mixers overnight
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: Data negates the possibility of liquidators behind the fund transfers due to the use of mixing tools and extensive planning to hide transaction paths.

item.title: MicroStrategy Bitcoin purchase divides the crypto community
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Many praised the move, while others brought up some potential negative effects of one entity holding a lot of Bitcoin.

item.title: Bitcoin price would surge past $600K if ‘hardest asset’ matches gold
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: The coming decade could be Bitcoin’s time to copy gold’s 1970s breakouts, says Capriole Investments.

item.title: Celsius wants to extend the deadline for claims as lawyer fees mount
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Administrative expenses from the bankruptcy proceedings have already topped $53 million, and continued delays are chipping away at Celsius’ estate.

item.title: 3Commas API leak victims demand refunds and apology for 'gaslighting'
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: 3Commas finally admitted there was an API leak, after months of refuting community reports that it had occurred. Users were not happy about being "gaslighted."

item.title: MicroStrategy to offer Bitcoin Lightning solutions in 2023
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ciaran Lyons
item.description: MicroStrategy’s Lightning Network solutions include Satoshi-powered incentives for marketing and website cybersecurity.

item.title: Sam Bankman-Fried's life on bail: Armed guards, daily jogs and gawkers
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Luke Huigsloot
item.description: Compared to his prison accommodations in the Bahamas, the former billionaire appears to be living a pretty decent life while under house arrest.

item.title: California regulator warns of 17 crypto websites suspected of fraud
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Quarmby
item.description: The last time the DFPI sent out such a large batch of crypto scam alerts was in June when it sounded the alarm over 26 dubious crypto platforms.

item.title: What to expect from crypto the year after FTX
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Amit Chaudhary
item.description: Users are still seeking to move their funds away from centralized exchanges, paving the way for blockchain-based alternatives to thrive.

item.title: 3Commas CEO confirms API key leak following warning from CZ
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Binance CEO was less than receptive to claims of losses due to a 3Comma API key leak earlier this month; now he recommends disabling 3Comma API keys.
